headline: INTELLIDRIVES CARTESIAN PLANAR SYSTEM
specstable:
Manufacturer IntelLiDrives
Model PXY-15X18
Stage Bearing Type Air Bearing
Stage Length 5.87 in (149 mm)
Stage Width 5.87 in (149 mm)
Tabletop Height 1.00 in (25.40 mm)
Controller Included No
Cables Included No
Other Information Two axis of motion in a single plane
Table size: 15" X 18"

Repeatability: 1-2 Micron
Resolution: 1-10 Micron
Motion strightness: 10 Micron
Flatness: 10 Micron
System requires driver and software(not included) available from www.intellidrives.com

Width 15.000 in (38.1 cm)
